java/liquibase/FileSystemFileOpener.java

00001 package liquibase;
00002 
00003 import java.io.File;
00004 import java.io.FileInputStream;
00005 import java.io.IOException;
00006 import java.io.InputStream;
00007 import java.net.MalformedURLException;
00008 import java.net.URL;
00009 import java.net.URLClassLoader;
00010 import java.util.ArrayList;
00011 import java.util.Enumeration;
00012 import java.util.Iterator;
00013 import java.util.List;
00014 
00024 public class FileSystemFileOpener implements FileOpener {
00025     String baseDirectory;
00026 
00031     public FileSystemFileOpener() {
00032         baseDirectory = null;
00033     }
00034 
00040     public FileSystemFileOpener(String base) {
00041         if (new File(base).isFile())
00042             throw new IllegalArgumentException("base must be a directory");
00043         baseDirectory = base;
00044     }
00045 
00050     public InputStream getResourceAsStream(String file) throws IOException {
00051         File absoluteFile = new File(file);
00052         File relativeFile = (baseDirectory == null) ? new File(file) : new File(baseDirectory, file);
00053 
00054         if (absoluteFile.exists() && absoluteFile.isFile() && absoluteFile.isAbsolute()) {
00055             return new FileInputStream(absoluteFile);
00056         } else if (relativeFile.exists() && relativeFile.isFile()) {
00057             return new FileInputStream(relativeFile);
00058         } else {
00059             return null;
00060 
00061         }
00062     }
00063 
00064     public Enumeration<URL> getResources(String packageName) throws IOException {
00065         String directoryPath = (new File(packageName).isAbsolute() || baseDirectory == null)
00066                 ? packageName : baseDirectory + File.separator + packageName;
00067 
00068         File[] files = new File(directoryPath).listFiles();
00069 
00070         List<URL> results = new ArrayList<URL>();
00071 
00072         for (File f : files) {
00073             results.add(new URL("file://" + f.getCanonicalPath()));
00074         }
00075 
00076         final Iterator<URL> it = results.iterator();
00077         return new Enumeration<URL>() {
00078 
00079             public boolean hasMoreElements() {
00080                 return it.hasNext();
00081             }
00082 
00083             public URL nextElement() {
00084                 return it.next();
00085             }
00086 
00087         };
00088     }
00089 
00090     public ClassLoader toClassLoader() {
00091         try {
00092             return new URLClassLoader(new URL[]{new URL("file://" + baseDirectory)});
00093         } catch (MalformedURLException e) {
00094             throw new RuntimeException(e);
00095         }
00096     }
00097 }
